website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty waffle maker with smart features that make cooking waffles to the perfect doneness easy.
pros: Durable, with 5 doneness levels so you can customize your perfect bake
Nonstick and relatively easy to clean
cons: Some users wish this machine had removable plates, but that's relatively rare for a waffle-only machine

customer_reviews.title: I must say - go to another manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: One star for bad client-centred approach. Tried to contact Calphalon twice through a web site contact form - no answer. Also, cooked couple times, used silicon cookware an only hand washed - "ceramic" coating anyway start coming off. You need to respond you clients Calphalon.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Makes great waffles but is messy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like the look and options that this waffle maker has, it makes great waffles and is easy to clean! My only issue with it and why I gave it 4 stars is because even when I measure out the batter exactly like it says there is still quite a bit of mix coming out the sides after the lid is closed which can get a bit messy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Cooks to perfection but.....
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve liked removable plates.... as much as this cost it should turn into a panini maker, waffle maker, and George Forman in one.
customer_reviews.author: LC Vickers

customer_reviews.title: Good proof cooking.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of waffle makers in the past but this one I love. It lets you know when it’s ready and the medium setting cooks the perfect waffle every time. The only quibble is that that the waffle grates don’t come out for cleaning. They are incredibly easy to clean if you just hit them with a little cooking spray you can easily wipe them clean after you finish and it has cooled off.
customer_reviews.author: Crashman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used
customer_reviews.text: Waffle maker has scratches on base and screen (no protective tape) thought I purchased a new unit!!! However would still like to purchase a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this waffle maker!
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon lived up to its name again for this one! This waffle maker is beautiful, high-quality, extremely easy to use, and makes the perfect waffle. It's easy to control the texture of the waffle with the settings provided. I also love how it is not coated with teflon. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: after years of using a cheaper iron with the darkness dial and quick heating, I gave the calphalon waffle iron a try. I had to get used to the slower heating time, but once I got in the habit of giving it the extra time necessary to heat, I'm hooked! the waffle iron makes great waffles and cleans up beautifully. The only negative is that it is a bit heavy...but, in my opinion, that's the only negative. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ddro

customer_reviews.title: Nice results, Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: It produced very nice waffles that are crispy from the outside and nice inside. The surface is really non stick that almost make cleaning unnecessary. There are two small cons: the Countdown timer did not start a couple of times and the outside surface paint is easily scratched. Finally, I bought this item less than a month ago on Black Friday and now it is 20$ cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: AHMAD A. ALSADAH

customer_reviews.title: My Mom loves this w.iron.
customer_reviews.text: My Brother and I gifted this to our Mother as a X-mas gift. She loves it and has had 0 complaints. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Great waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a cheaper waffle iron months ago and the waffles stuck every time. i didn't want to pay this much for a waffle maker. I finally decided I could not live without a decent waffle. It has been wonderful. It is so easy to use and the timer is great. I leave it on 4 and get a crisp brown waffle every time. I am so glad I purchased this waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffles
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of cooking a quality waffle with this iron. Cleaning, in the absence of being able to soak the griddle is sometimes challenging, especially when using fruit, i.e. blueberries. Overall, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but a pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: This waffle maker works well, is easy to use, and is easy to store. My only complaint is that it is not at all easy to clean. Next time I think I'll buy one with removable plates.
customer_reviews.author: DogMom

customer_reviews.title: I love waffles
customer_reviews.text: The perfect waffle and the perfect gift for a waffle guy
customer_reviews.author: Hussain

customer_reviews.title: works great but after one use the inside coating chipped off
customer_reviews.text: works great but after one use the inside coating chipped off. i asked for a replacement unit waiting for it to be delivered
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, Excellent Control
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars as the unit is the perfect size for me and the temperature control is spot on for controlling the browning of the waffle. The problem I had is, while cleaning the inevitable overage of batter, the lid suffered a major scratch just from my fingernail scraping off the cooked on batter. Needs a better paint job. Otherwise, great latch/lock and handle for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love waffles and this makes perfect waffles every single time. Its non stick so really easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Morong

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this waffle maker based on the Consumer Reports recommendation. I wish the plates were removable for easier cleanup and I am used to a round belgium waffle rather than square. I think it will work out OK.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: We have used this new waffle maker several times and it has passed our expectations! Love the non stick feature one time whe I pourers too much batter. When not in use, the maker closes and stands upright on the shelf, hatdly taking up any room. Nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA WILSON

customer_reviews.title: NIce
customer_reviews.text: My husband used it and liked it and he isn't a cook but had no trouble using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good waffle, alarm beep is great to have
customer_reviews.text: a friend gave me a $100.00 Amazon gift card, I have been wanting this Waffle cooker for a while. I like the beep that tells me my waffle is ready.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hurba

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, perfect waffle
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect plantain waffles, no cleaning necessary! Just wipe down for crumbs after it’s cooled down.
customer_reviews.author: Kristel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly.  Turn on when ready
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Made waffles a few times. No sticking. Waffles come out easy. Turn it on when you are ready. Don't leave on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product and price I brought a second one for my college son. Easy and ready for use
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffles everytime!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, makes great waffles. Downside, if you want feed alot of people at once maybe get something bigger, makes 2 waffles at a time, takes about 4 minutes per serving. For us it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Krelcoha

customer_reviews.title: Best waffle iron I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Easy to use and clean. Can be stored on it's side.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot. Works great for small or large groups.
customer_reviews.author: Mblack

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have several cheap and expensive waffle makers but this one has been the best one we had!! 5 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Eric Culp

customer_reviews.title: The outside surface is not easy to clean as the inside.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use Making waffle for individual use that is not fast paced.
customer_reviews.author: Wesen

customer_reviews.title: Neat Little Good Quality Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and well built. Nice features like timer to tell you when it is ready for batter and another timer to tell when the waffle is done. I think there is a bell at the end for each. The only reason it is marked down a little is because of the lingering metallic smell. I heated it up a couple times before using it, cleaned it lightly as well. One other small issue I guess is that the edges are sometimes not as well-cooked as the center. I kind of tweak the recipe and often use GF flour so that might be the reason. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Timer Function Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. I did not like that the timer function is automatically set and won't restart if you take a waffle out "early" when its done and so then I was always trying to trick it out by turning it off and on again or by just starting a waffle and keeping track of the time myself, etc...
customer_reviews.author: amandasuzanne

customer_reviews.title: Contains PTFE and PFOA
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but sadly it contains PTFE and PFOA. I was seeing confetti-like itty bits of black flakes flaking right off of the grill plates that the waffles were stuck to. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Member

customer_reviews.title: industrial quality waffle maker
customer_reviews.text: waffles made from scratch have been a family favorite for two decades. When the previous waffle maker failed I found this highly rated model and it has been working well. Making two waffles at a time is an advantage. The waffle maker is well made with sturdy materials. The nonstick coating is very easy to clean and is better than any nonstick coating I have ever seen. The settings knob allows finetuning of the crispness.. The time display solves the "dad when is my waffle ready" problem. Vertical storage is handy in a small kitchen. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: dotsnail

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous waffles no off-gassing ceramic non-stick surface.
customer_reviews.text: We returned 4 waffle makers before landing on this one. Thank goodness this went on sale for $62. Having said that, after using it, it's worth $100. I will definitely buy this again. The ceramic surface is beautiful, we have been using it daily for several months and it makes beautiful waffles every time. It has a large digital screen that let's you know when its preheating, ready to cook and large numbers that count down while cooking. I love that it has a light beep when ready to cook and again when it is done cooking so if I am busy elsewhere I am reminded to deal with it. We LOVE, LOVE LOVE this waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Artminx

customer_reviews.title: Best waffle iron I have owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best waffle iron I have ever owned, nothing sticks to it, there is no need for cooking sprays. Heats up quickly and maintains the heat for cooking multiple waffles. There are multiple settings for how done you want your waffle. Start out on 3 and adjust to your taste from there.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great machine but timer is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very nice waffle maker- is very easy to clean and is serious quality. The only thing I would say is it cooks much faster than the timer, not a bad thing as it cooks the waffles in about a minute. BUT you should not keep your waffles in for the full amount of time as they will cook too much even on low. So therefore the timer is useless. Only reason I rated this a 4 not a 5!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Adams

customer_reviews.title: Makes great waffles
customer_reviews.text: Makes great waffles. I couldn’t wait to try this out on my family when you came down for Thanksgiving. It was awesome. I really like how it beeps when it tells you that it’s done preheating and also when the waffles are done
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffles
customer_reviews.text: We prefer waffles that are crispy on the outside yet not dry in the inside and this waffle maker has hit the mark every time (using the med setting). It is well-made/sturdy, looks nice, and is super easy to use. The countdown timer is a great feature, too. Even though the plates are not removable, there is zero sticking and wipes clean once cooled down. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waffles
customer_reviews.text: Besides making perfect waffles this model is easy to clean and takes up minimal storage space. We owned a major brand model previously that made good waffles but took up much more storage space and fell apart after 16 months of service. What's not to like about perfect waffles, easy clean and minimal storage space. The price was less than 1/2 the price of a major product raters #1 rated product.
customer_reviews.author: John Riebesehl

customer_reviews.title: I like this Waffle maker over
customer_reviews.text: the Cuisinart WAF-V100 Vertical Waffle Maker, Silver, bought that a couple of years ago. This one seems to heat better., pus it has a section if you do too many ingredients. Compact with the closure hook. ceramic coating. .
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: We like it but it doesn’t cook evenly. One side is crisp the other side it raw. Very uneven cooking. Spills out the sides. Don’t love that either. Hard to clean. Now not working.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Don't, just don't
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price, it burns a circle at the bottom. The's older style it's much better!
customer_reviews.author: Karlita

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Waffle Maker! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Perfect waffles. You don’t have to pre spray it either. Excellent waffle maker. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waffles
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for storage, not too heavy, easy to clean , easy to use and makes great waffles!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry F.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we hoped for!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this waffle maker!! Easy to use, easy to clean, stores nicely. We are very pleased with this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Use it every weekend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this waffle maker for my son and he uses it every weekend to make breakfast. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Croft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes perfect waffles!! Better than the flip over model I had before and takes up less room. No oil needed, seriously, none. Clean up is easy peasy!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol N.

product_meta.title: Calphalon Intellicrisp Waffle Maker, Dark Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Calphalon IntelliCrisp™ Waffle Maker features a ceramic cooking surface that delivers 20% more even heat* for crisp, fluffy waffles. A high-contrast LCD screen displays a countdown timer for intuitive control and precise results. The waffle maker locks for convenient, compact, vertical storage. Choose between 5 waffle shades to match your preferred level of browning and crispiness. The ceramic surface is 11x more durable* than standard nonstick and provides easy food release for quick cleanup.
feature_bullets: Ceramic-coated cooking plates deliver 20% more even heat* for crisp, fluffy waffles (*compared to standard nonstick)
Even heat ceramic cooking surface cleans easily and is 11x more durable* (*compared to standard nonstick)
Locks closed for convenient vertical storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
